xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 04 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has quit 02:25 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 09:57 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:28 <akats> ok got the labels in 10:29 <sdumitriu1> Committed? 10:31 <akats> just did 10:33 <sdumitriu1> K 10:51 <akats> fixed up 10:53 <sdumitriu1> Well, the method is still named insertHpoTerm, you should remove HPO from everywhere. Call it insertOntologyTerm, and fix the JavaDoc 11:02 <akats> has quit 11:04 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:12 <akats> Did I miss anything this time? 11:15 <sdumitriu1> Checking 11:17 <sdumitriu1> Looks good 11:17 <sdumitriu1> I'll merge it soon, I have something else to debug 11:17 <sdumitriu1> There's some haunted code... 11:19 <akats> there should be sound effects in IRC 11:19 <akats> has quit 11:19 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:20 <akats> So what is my task for now 11:22 <sdumitriu1> Found the ghost 11:22 <sdumitriu1> ghosts 11:24 <akats> :) 11:25 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/685 11:25 <sdumitriu1> The buggy code is in the obo2solr module 11:26 <sdumitriu1> http://oboformat.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/obo-syntax.html describes the OBO syntax 11:26 <sdumitriu1> Marta can answer questions, I'll be in a call 11:26 <akats> ok 12:32 <akats> would this count as a definition with a colon 12:33 <akats> um... i got an IRC error. let me resend that. 12:33 <akats> would this count as a definition with a colon 12:33 <akats> Hypogonadotropic hypogonadism is characterized by reduced function of the gonads (testes in males or ovaries in females) and results from the absence of the gonadal stimulating pituitary hormones: follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) and luteinizing hormone (LH). 12:33 <sdumitriu1> Yes 12:34 <sdumitriu1> Did you fix it? 12:34 <akats> Nope 12:35 <akats> And by index you mean anything here for example http://localhost:8080/solr/hpo/select?q=id:*0000044 12:37 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 12:37 <sdumitriu1> Hold on a second 12:37 <sdumitriu1> I'm pretty sure I'm not crazy 12:41 <sdumitriu1> Oh... 12:41 <sdumitriu1> Nevermind... 12:41 <sdumitriu1> That is indeed invalid 12:42 <sdumitriu1> But this one isn't: https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/684 12:43 <sdumitriu1> For example: http://localhost:8080/solr/hpo/select?q=id:*0001212 12:54 <sdumitriu1> akats: https://github.com/organizations/phenotips/dashboard/issues/assigned?direction=desc&state=open (your assigned issues) 13:22 <akats> whats $1? 14:51 <akats> has quit
